SEARCH
Package domain

Class ReportController

java.lang.Object
domain.ReportController
public class ReportController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing Report entities including creation, retrieval by technician or site, and validation of reports.

  • Method Details

    • getTechnicians

      public List<User> getTechnicians()
      Retrieves a list of all users with the role of technician.
      Returns:
      a list of users with the Role.TECHNIEKER

    • createReport

      public ReportDTO createReport(SiteDTOWithoutMachines site, MaintenanceDTO maintenance, UserDTO technician, LocalDate startDate, LocalTime startTime, LocalDate endDate, LocalTime endTime, String reason, String remarks) throws InformationRequiredExceptionReport
      Creates a new maintenance report and persists it in the database.
      Parameters:
      site - the site where the maintenance occurred
      maintenance - the related maintenance activity
      technician - the technician who performed the maintenance
      startDate - the start date of the maintenance
      startTime - the start time of the maintenance
      endDate - the end date of the maintenance
      endTime - the end time of the maintenance
      reason - the reason for maintenance
      remarks - any additional remarks
      Returns:
      a ReportDTO representing the saved report
      Throws:
      InvalidReportException - if the report is invalid or saving fails
      InformationRequiredExceptionReport

    • validateReport

      public void validateReport(Report report) throws InvalidReportException
      Validates a report by checking for required fields.
      Parameters:
      report - the report to validate
      Throws:
      InvalidReportException - if any critical fields are missing

    • getReportsByTechnician

      public List<Report> getReportsByTechnician(User technician)
      Retrieves all reports created by a specific technician.
      Parameters:
      technician - the technician whose reports are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of Report instances created by the given technician
      Throws:
      InvalidReportException - if the technician is null

    • getReportsBySite

      public List<Report> getReportsBySite(Site site)
      Retrieves all reports for a given site.
      Parameters:
      site - the site whose reports are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of Report instances for the specified site
      Throws:
      InvalidReportException - if the site is null
